name: react-native-analytics-segment-io
description: A React Native wrapper for Segment Analytics

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp index.js dist/index.js.flow && cp index.d.ts dist && babel --plugins babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types index.js > dist/index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: LEO Pharma A/S
